value.title: Facebook's AI team expands post-grad courses for Black and Latinx students

value.title: Cruise, GM to seek U.S. okay for self-driving vehicle without pedal, steering wheel
value.excerpt: Self-driving car maker Cruise said on Wednesday it and majority shareholder General Motors Co would seek U.S. regulatory approval in coming months to deploy a limited number of Cruise Origin vehicles without steering wheels or pedals.
